comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O praise ye the LORD and sing a new song, amid all the saints His praises prolong; the praise of their Maker His people shall sing, and children of Zion rejoice in their King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: With timbrel and harp and joyful acclaim, with gladness and mirth, sing praise to His Name; for God in His people His pleasure doth seek, with robes of salvation He clotheth the meek.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: In glory exult, ye saints of the LORD; with songs in the night high praises accord; go forth in His service, be strong in His might to conquer all evil and stand for the right.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: For this is His word: His saints shall not fail, but over the earth their pow'r shall prevail; all kingdoms and nations shall yield to their sway. to God give the glory and praise Him for aye.
